entry.title: Automated Threats Pose Increasing Risk to the Travel Industry
entry.summary: As the travel industry rebounds post-pandemic, it is increasingly targeted by automated threats, with the sector experiencing nearly 21% of all bot attack requests last year. That’s according to research from Imperva, a Thales company. In their 2024 Bad Bot Report, Imperva finds that bad bots accounted for 44.5% of the industry’s web traffic in 2023—a significant jump from 37.4% in 2022.

entry.summary: Tahanan reman ke atas pekebun itu bagi membantu siasatan membabitkan kematian kanak-kanak selepas disyaki makan keropok beracun.

entry.title: Kerajaan Persekutuan, Sabah masing-masing raih hasil petroleum RM23 bilion sejak 1976 - PMO
entry.summary: Kerajaan Persekutuan dan Sabah telah menerima bayaran hasil petroleum berjumlah kira-kira RM23 bilion dari 1976 hingga separuh pertama 2024.

entry.title: Pempengaruh maut: Seorang lagi pengguna TikTok ditahan
entry.summary: Ketua Polis Daerah Sentul ACP Ahmad Sukarno Mohd Zahari berkata, lelaki tempatan itu ditahan kira-kira jam 6.30 petang di Setapak.

entry.title: Sony Unveils New ZV-E10 II Vlogging Camera
entry.summary: Sony has unveiled the mirrorless ZV-E10 II, three years after the debut of its predecessor, the ZV-E10. This new model is designed for vloggers, maintaining popular features like the background defocus capability and vari-angle flip screen while introducing several enhancements. entry.title: Pempengaruh suami isteri akan direman kes seleweng duit derma
entry.summary: Lelaki itu dan isterinya kelihatan tenang dan sempat melemparkan senyuman kepada pengamal media, ketika dibawa ke mahkamah.
